prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (handsome American martial artist:1.2), lean muscular physique, long blonde hair, confident smile, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: realistic hair strands, sun-kissed skin texture, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching heavy cotton karate gi fabric:1.2), visible muscle definition, sharp focus, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, doll, flat lighting, messy face, neon red, low quality, blurry, (short hair:1.2), weak, sad expression, mannequin
